name: ESP_AT_WM_Lite
keywords: wifi, MultiWiFi, ESP8266, AT, shield, AVR Mega, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, STM32, Credentials, Manager, dynamic, custom, parameter, light-weight, EEPROM, FlashStorage, DueFlashStorage, LittleFS
description: Light-Weight WiFi/Credentials Manager for AVR Mega, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, STM32, etc. boards running ESP8266 AT-command shields with web configuration portal. Powerful-yet-simple-to-use feature to enable adding dynamic custom parameters. You can also specify static AP and STA IP. Use much less memory compared to full-fledge WiFiManager. Config Portal will be auto-adjusted to match the number of dynamic custom parameters. Credentials and dynamic custom parameters are saved in EEPROM, FlashStorage, DueFlashStorage of LittleFS.
